title: The Action Bible (Chapter Version)
description:
With huge amounts of respect to the original scanners and blackcanary (who first uploaded this complete version), I've done a bit of work to this book. The original was one a huge, single file that was causing problems for my comic book reader(s). It took a long time to load and froze fairly often. So, the changes to this upload are as follows...

Removed a few blank pages and the image of the book end
Re-sized all images to 1440 by (aprox.) 2250 (plenty big enough for this book)
Did some image/color work on the entire book (it looked OK, but the color was washed out)
Separated the book into chapter sections according to the table of contents
Created a title page for each chapter
The chapters now range is size from 33 to 144 mb - the ToC and Index sections are even smaller

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

'The Action Bible'

David C. Cook, 2010, 752 pages

Illustrated by Sergio Cariello

Edited by Doug Mauss

Here's the most complete picture Bible ever! And it features a captivating, up-to-date artwork style-making it the perfect Bible for today's visually focused culture.
 
The Action Bible presents 215 fast-paced narratives in chronological order, making it easier to follow the Bible's historical flow - and reinforcing the build-up to its thrilling climax.
 
The stories in The Action Bible communicate clearly and forcefully to contemporary readers. This compelling blend of clear writing plus dramatic images offers an appeal that crosses all age boundaries.
 
Brazilian artist Sergio Cariello has created attention-holding illustrations marked by rich coloring, dramatic shading and lighting, bold and energetic designs, and emotionally charged figures.
 
Let this epic rendition draw you into all the excitement of the world's most awesome story.
